document_data.mainbody:
Trondhelm was a small village located on Omans Isle within the Moonshae Isles.
The village was located within the heart of the Old Stone Wood on the western coast of the island.
Thelgaar Ironhand, a Jarl of Oman during the mid 14 century DR, was born in Trondhelm. Like the rest of the settlements on Omans Isle, Trondhelm was overrun and ruled by giants by the later part of the 15 century DR.
